title: BRIEF-A. H. Belo Corporation Announces Q4 Revenue Fell 3.1 Percent To $64.1 Million
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - A. H. Belo Corp:
* ORATION ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE FELL 3.1 PERCENT TO $64.1 MILLION * IN Q4 OF 2017 ADJUSTED OPERATING INCOME OF $5.5 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF $3.7 MILLION FROM Q4 2016
* Q4 2017 INCOME FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS BEFORE INCOME TAXES OF $6.9 MILLION
* AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017, CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS BALANCE WAS $57.7 MILLION AND COMPANY HAD NO DEBT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
